name: Jurassic Arena (Beta)
description:
In the year 2044 overpopulation coupled with corporate greed and a lack of resources has forced many into a life of crime. In an attempt to quell the rising number of people below the poverty line the global government introduced several new laws raising the sentences for petty crimes.

By 2050 prison systems world wide were at their limit crowded far beyond capacity. Government could no longer provide the finances to sustain the ever growing number of inmates. In order to keep prison systems operational they would be sold to massive corporations with prisoner rights completely abolished.  

Prison 146-au also known as The Breach was now fully owned and operated by Edison, the global leader in science, technology and entertainment. having years earlier created the TENT (Transtemporal Entity Nexus Travel) a machine that allowed for temporary time travel.

Mere months after acquiring the breach Edison releases their hit tv show ‘Jurassic Arena’. Forcing inmates of the breach through the TENT back to the Jurassic era to fight for their lives against hordes of dinosaurs. 

You play as an Inmate of the breach forced through the breach in a fight for your life. Can you live long enough to be pulled back ?    

There are no prizes you live or you die.
